item.title: About Hugo XMag
item.description: XMag is the second Hugo theme I have designed. It is based on my first Hugo theme XMin, and similarly, features minimalism but with a magazine style on the homepage inspired by The Signpost on Wikipedia. You can find its source code on Github: https://github.com/yihui/hugo-xmag (licensed under MIT). Features This theme includes a few cool features: Responsive article summary blocks on homepage Thumbnails in summary blocks Magazine title in Blackletter (𝔅𝔏𝔄ℭ𝔎 𝔏𝔈𝔗𝔗𝔈ℜ)
